Face backward!\""},{"lineNumber":226896,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アホか！　敵の罠だろこれは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Are you an idiot?! This has to be an enemy trap!"},{"lineNumber":226897,"originalJapaneseLine":"　襲撃が来るかもなのに背が向けられっか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We can’t turn our backs when an attack might Wh-what what what!?"},{"lineNumber":226916,"originalJapaneseLine":"　手ぇ引っ張るのやめてよ！？","translatedEnglishLine":"Stop pulling my hand!?"},{"lineNumber":226917,"originalJapaneseLine":"　無理無理無理！　今はそういうの無理だから！」","translatedEnglishLine":"N-No way, no way! I can’t do that now!\""},{"lineNumber":226918,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だー！　普段は裸見られても気にしませーん、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come on! You normally act like you don’t mind people seeing you naked,"},{"lineNumber":226919,"originalJapaneseLine":"　みたいなキャラしてる癖にごたごた抜かすな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"so stop making a fuss now!\""},{"lineNumber":226920,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いーーーやーーー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-noooo!?\""},{"lineNumber":226921,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とっ、とと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"T-t-to to...\""},{"lineNumber":226922,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………あれ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":226923,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……服、戻ったわね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Our clothes are back on.\""},{"lineNumber":226924,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうやら……ある境界線を越えると","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Apparently... when crossing a certain boundary,"},{"lineNumber":226925,"originalJapaneseLine":"　装備がなくなるようですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"your equipment disappears.\""},{"lineNumber":226926,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、これはなくなるのではなく……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, it's not that it disappears..."},{"lineNumber":226927,"originalJapaneseLine":"「見えなくなる、だな。","translatedEnglishLine":"It becomes invisible."},{"lineNumber":226928,"originalJapaneseLine":"　見ろ、なくなった筈の剣の柄で絵が描けらぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Look, I’m drawing with the hilt of the sword that’s supposed to be gone.\""},{"lineNumber":226929,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザンスが境界線の向こうに腕だけ突っ込んで、","translatedEnglishLine":"Zansu stuck only his arm beyond the boundary bit,"},{"lineNumber":226931,"originalJapaneseLine":"何もないにも関わらず地面にハニーの絵が描かれた。","translatedEnglishLine":"a picture of Honey appeared on the ground despite nothing being there."},{"lineNumber":226932,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ったく、服が消えただけで人騒がせな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Geez, just the clothes disappearing causes a commotion.\""},{"lineNumber":226933,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ザンス、あまり言うな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Zansu, don’t say that too much.\""},{"lineNumber":226934,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あ〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, uh...\""},{"lineNumber":226935,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えーーーと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U-um...\""},{"lineNumber":226936,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おのれ！　なんて卑劣な罠！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"D-damn it! What a despicable trap!\""},{"lineNumber":226937,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いやーんとか、お前もあんな声出すんだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"'Nooo,' huh? You actually make sounds like that too.\""},{"lineNumber":226938,"originalJapaneseLine":"「エロガキ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Perverted brat!\""},{"lineNumber":226939,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はり倒すぞテメェ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I’ll knock you out, you bastard!\""},{"lineNumber":226940,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しっかしなんなんだ、ここ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But seriously, what is this place...\""},{"lineNumber":226941,"originalJapaneseLine":"「奥を調べたいけど……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I want to check the back, but..."},{"lineNumber":226942,"originalJapaneseLine":"　は、裸になっちゃう、よね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’d end up naked, right...?\""},{"lineNumber":226943,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っすよねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Exactly.\""},{"lineNumber":226944,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":226945,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":226946,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜すたすたすた＞","translatedEnglishLine":"  <pad, pad, pad>"},{"lineNumber":226947,"originalJapaneseLine":"「＜エール＞！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yell!?\""},{"lineNumber":226948,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたが奥へ入ると、","translatedEnglishLine":"When you entered deeper,"},{"lineNumber":226949,"originalJapaneseLine":"確かに装備が全て消えて裸になった。","translatedEnglishLine":"all your equipment indeed vanished and you became naked."},{"lineNumber":226950,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この馬鹿！　簡単に入るなよ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You idiot! Don’t just enter so easily!?\""},{"lineNumber":226951,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんなの脱ぎたいの！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What? You want to take your clothes off!?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男の人は、後ろ向いて！　後ろ！」
「アホか！　敵の罠だろこれは！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are you an idiot?! This has to be an enemy trap!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 襲撃が来るかもなのに背が向けられっか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can’t turn our backs when an attack might come!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「い、いいからあっち向いてー！」
「とりあえず二人とも、この外套を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For now, both of you, take this cloak..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱義が差しだそうとした外套が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The cloak Rangi tried to hand over,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あるラインを越えると突然消えてしまい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: suddenly vanished when crossing a certain line,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 慌てて乱義が手を引っ込めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Rangi hurriedly pulled his hand back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すると、すぐにまた外套が手元に現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, immediately, the cloak reappeared in his hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっはーん、そこが『境界線』か……」
手ぇ引っ張るのやめてよ！？
無理無理無理！　今はそういうの無理だから！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: N-No way, no way! I can’t do that now!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だー！　普段は裸見られても気にしませーん、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come on! You normally act like you don’t mind people seeing you naked,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みたいなキャラしてる癖にごたごた抜かすな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so stop making a fuss now!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうやら……ある境界線を越えると
装備がなくなるようですね」
「いや、これはなくなるのではなく……」
見ろ、なくなった筈の剣の柄で絵が描けらぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Look, I’m drawing with the hilt of the sword that’s supposed to be gone."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンスが境界線の向こうに腕だけ突っ込んで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zansu stuck only his arm beyond the boundary line,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手をちょこちょこと動かすと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and when he moved his hand a bit,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何もないにも関わらず地面にハニーの絵が描かれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a picture of Honey appeared on the ground despite nothing being there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ったく、服が消えただけで人騒がせな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Geez, just the clothes disappearing causes a commotion."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おのれ！　なんて卑劣な罠！」
「いやーんとか、お前もあんな声出すんだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "'Nooo,' huh? You actually make sounds like that too."
"I want to check the back, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: は、裸になっちゃう、よね……」
確かに装備が全て消えて裸になった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: all your equipment indeed vanished and you became naked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この馬鹿！　簡単に入るなよ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You idiot! Don’t just enter so easily!?"
"What? You want to take your clothes off!?"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
